info.title: Insights API
info.description: API to retrieve realtime market analytics for lodging suppliers

get.summary: get missed opportunities by hotel ID
get.description: get missed opportunities for today(checkinDate is today)

400.description: status: 'Error', errorCode: 2002, errorMsg: 'This hotel has no competitors'

get.summary: get missed opportunities by hotel ID
get.description: get missed opportunities whose checkinDate in a specified time range

parameters.description: The check in start date(format: yyyy-MM-dd). Default = today.
parameters.name: checkInStartDate

parameters.description: The check in end date(format: yyyy-MM-dd). Default = today.
parameters.name: checkInEndDate

400.description: status: 'Error', errorCode: 2002, errorMsg: 'This hotel has no competitors'

get.summary: get current and previous average sort rank
get.description: get current and previous average sort rank

400.description: status: 'Error', errorCode: 2000, errorMsg: 'Hotel is not exist'

get.description: get compressionPercent data

400.description: status: 'Error', errorCode: 2000, errorMsg: 'Hotel is not exist'

get.summary: get competitors' room left information of tonight
get.description: get competitors' room left information of tonight

400.description: status: 'Error', errorCode: 2002, errorMsg: 'This hotel has no competitors'

get.summary: get competitors' sold out information of tonight
get.description: get competitors' sold out information of tonight

400.description: status: 'Error', errorCode: 2002, errorMsg: 'This hotel has no competitors'

get.summary: get newsfeed between startDate and endDate
get.description: get newsfeed data

parameters.description: event type list, example: Booking or give a eventType list like this: Booking,Canceled,CompetitorPriceChange
parameters.name: eventType

parameters.description: excludedEventId list, example: 1234,or give a excludedEventId list like this: 1234,45678,1212
parameters.name: excludedEventId

parameters.description: limit, the default value is 50, example: 10
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: client ID, fill your clientId here
parameters.name: clientId

400.description: status: 'Error', errorCode: 3021, errorMsg: 'The endDate was not valid date, the date format should be yyyy-MM-dd.'

get.summary: replenish stubbedData for newsfeed api
get.description: replenish stubbedData for newsfeed api

parameters.description: client ID, fill your clientId here
parameters.name: clientId

400.description: ‘status’:‘Failed to replenish stubbed data for newsfeed API with hotelId:758,errorMsg=Failed to connect Mongodb’

parameters.name: startDate

parameters.name: endDate

get.summary: Get interest price range information
get.description: Get interest price range information

parameters.description: booked start date, format is YYYY-MM-DD. (required)
parameters.name: bookedStartDate

parameters.description: booked end date, format is YYYY-MM-DD. (required)
parameters.name: bookedEndDate

parameters.description: check in date, format is YYYY-MM-DD. (required)
parameters.name: checkInDate

parameters.description: if set true, ignore data whose value is 0. (optional)
parameters.name: ignoreZero

400.description: status: 'Error', errorCode: 3112, errorMsg: 'The range size should be positive integer.'

get.summary: get compression data between startDate and endDate
get.description: get compression data

400.description: status: 'Error', errorCode: 2002, errorMsg: 'This hotel has no compression data available'

get.summary: Get price distribution information
get.description: Get price distribution information

parameters.description: check in date, format is YYYY-MM-DD. (required)
parameters.name: checkInDate

400.description: status: 'Error', errorCode: 3112, errorMsg: 'The length of stay should be positive integer.'

lostBookings.description: total lost bookings to this hotel

lostUSD.description: total lost US Dollar to this hotel

details.description: details for the lost bookings information

viewedPrice.description: your price viewed by hotel shopper

bookedPrice.description: competitor's price which is booked by hotel shopper

data.description: Sold out room types by hotel

num.description: the number of travelers visited this hotel's infosite page

searchDate.description: The date when we search this hotel

avgRank.description: Average sort rank in the related search date

avgPriceAmount.description: Average price amount in the related search date

data.description: Average Daily Rate (ADR) for per day

min.description: Minimal average daily rate of competitor hotel

max.description: Maximal average daily rate of competitor hotel

data.description: the comparison of today's fair share with last 7, 14, 21 and 28 days' fair share

fairShare.description: fair share metrics. it's roomCount/(roomCount + compSetRoomCount)

data.description: Interest price range at a specified time

count.description: the number of booking in this price range

priceDistributionArr.description: price distribution in one market at a specified time

lowestPriceArr.description: the list of hotel with lowest price at a specified time

rooms.description: the number of rooms in this price range

yourHotelflag.description: the price distribution of your hotel

lowestPrice.description: the lowest ADR price of hotel
